snippet: The 113th Congress is the most diverse in its history, and if recent voting patterns are a guide, it also could be among the most polarized, according to a biannual assessment of the legislative branch.
abstract: The 113th Congress is the most diverse in its history, and if recent voting patterns are a guide, it also could be among the most polarized, according to a biannual assessment of the legislative branch.

headline.main: Report Says Congress Is More Diverse and More Divided

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Enterprise Institute for Public Policy Research
